name: Mahina's Route
description:
HAHAHA I FINALLY MADE A LOVE INTEREST ROUTE!!! This is like a small love letter to the devs of Blooming Panic because they put so much love and time into creating such a wonderful game that EVERYONE should check out!! <3 

This doesn't have any audio since I'm not THAT technical yet, but once I figure it out I will update it :3
